title: Software Engineer
text: As an individual developer, I had the opportunity to participate in the FTSO (Flare Time Series Oracle) for both the Flare/Songbird network and the Tellor reporter ecosystem. And also delved deeper into the Aptos/Sui network, which I believe will be a game-changer in the upcoming web3 world.

title: Lead Blockchain Developer
text: As a lead blockchain developer, I have successfully developed and deployed DeFi solutions with bridge integration that enabled seamless interoperability between different blockchain networks, while also building a decentralized marketplace that facilitated secure and transparent transactions for users worldwide.

title: Blockchain Engineer
text: As a Blockchain developer with DeFi experience developing and implementing smart contracts for DeFi applications, collaborating with other developers and stakeholders, and staying up-to-date with the latest developments in blockchain technology.

title: Blockchain Engineer (Intern)
text: Through my internship at Enjin, I gained valuable experience in full-stack development and gained a deep understanding of blockchain technology and its applications. I enjoyed collaborating with my colleagues and working on projects that had a real impact on the company's growth.
